name: chronolog
short_description:
This is tool which can work on given set of log files .
Provided the log lines have definitive structure and a date time stamp is available and mentioned in the configuration file
all the logs lines can be aggregated in one file chronologically.

New parsers can be plugged in .

The tool takes care of stack traces as well for log4j files.
summary: Arranges logs from multiple files in chronological order.
